tosurnament.unknown_error: Oops, something went wrong. Please contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
tosurnament.not_on_a_server: This command can only be ran on a server.
tosurnament.not_owner: You need to be the owner of the server to use this command.
tosurnament.change_nickname_forbidden: Sorry, I can't change your nickname. Either you have better rights than the bot or the bot doesn't have the `Change nicknames` right. Please contact an admin.
tosurnament.change_role_forbidden: Sorry, I can't add you a role. The bot doesn't have the `Manage roles` right. Please contact an admin.
tosurnament.not_linked: Your account is not linked. Please run the `%1link $tosurnament/link/parameter` command.
tosurnament.not_verified: Your account is not verified. Please run the `%1auth` command.
tosurnament.already_verified: Your account is already verified. Maybe you wanted to use the `%1register` command ?
tosurnament.already_registered: You are already registered. If you have a problem with your current roles, please contact an admin.
tosurnament.osu_error: Oops. An error has occured. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
tosurnament.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
tosurnament.no_bracket: This bracket does not exists. Check existing brackets using the `%1get_bracket` command.
tosurnament.no_rights: You don't have the rights to use this command.
tosurnament.no_player_role: There's no `Player` role. Ask an admin to create it.
tosurnament.not_a_player: You're not on the player list. I can't register you. ='(
tosurnament.no_referee_role: There's no `Referee` role set. Ask an admin to set it.
tosurnament.not_a_referee: You're not a referee so you cannot use this command.
tosurnament.not_a_streamer: You're not a streamer so you cannot use this command.
tosurnament.not_a_commentator: You're not a commentator so you cannot use this command.
tosurnament.not_a_staff: You're not a staff member so you cannot use this command.
tosurnament.not_team_captain: You're not a team captain so you cannot use this command.
tosurnament.challonge_server_error: Connection error with challonge. If the problem persists, contact spartan.plume@gmail.com
tosurnament.challonge_no_rights: The challonge account `TosurnamentBot` does not have the rights to modify the challonge.
tosurnament.challonge_not_found: Challonge not found. Did you set the challonge correctly ?

link.help: Links your osu! account to your discord account
link.success:
Please authenticate your osu! account by setting the following code

%1

 as your location on your osu! profile.

Once done, send the `%2auth` command.

auth.help: Links your osu! account to your discord account
auth.wrong_code: Your location is not your given code. If you forgot your code or make a mistake in your username, please reuse the `%1link` command.
auth.success: Congrats, your account has been verified.

create_tournament.tournament_already_created: This server already has a tournament running. If you want to create a new one, please end this one with the %1end_tournament command.

end_tournament.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to end the tournament ? If yes, react with :white_check_mark:, else react with :negative_squared_cross_mark:.
end_tournament.refused: You refused to end the tournament.
end_tournament.success: Tournament ended successfully. You can now create a new one.

get_bracket.default:
List of all brackets:
%2
Use `%1get_bracket $tosurnament/get_bracket/parameter` to change the current bracket.

set_bracket_role.help: Role to add when a player registers and is in this bracket

set_staff_channel.help: Sets the staff channel to ping staff role

set_admin_role.help: All of those with the role <role> can do admin command on the bot

set_ping_team.help: Sets if the team or the team captain shoule be pinged for reschedule.

set_reschedule_hours_deadline.help: Sets the deadline to reschedule a match (in hours before the match)
set_reschedule_hours_deadline.success: Deadline to reschedule a match set.

set_reschedule_range_begin.help: Sets a range to reschedule a match

set_reschedule_range_end.help: Sets a range to reschedule a match

set_players_spreadsheet.help: Sets the players spreadsheet to allow registration

register.help: Registers you and gives you the `Player` role on discord (if you're on the player list)
register.no_players_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any players spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_players_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_players_spreadsheet/parameter`.
register.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com

set_schedules_spreadsheet.help: Sets the schedules spreadsheet to allow reschedule

reschedule.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
reschedule.no_schedules_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any schedules spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_schedules_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_schedules_spreadsheet/parameter`.
reschedule.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
reschedule.invalid_match: You can't reschedule a match you're not in.
reschedule.past_deadline: Sorry, the deadline to reschedule your match is passed. You can try contacting an admin to reschedule your match.
reschedule.impossible_reschedule: Sorry, the time to which you want to reschedule your match is not acceptable. You can try contacting an admin to reschedule your match.
reschedule.same_date: You can't reschedule your match to the time it is already scheduled to.
reschedule.success: Hi %1! %2 would like to reschedule the match %3 from %4 to %5. If you accept, please add a :thumbsup: reaction to this message. If you refuse, add a :thumbsdown: reaction to this message
reschedule.accepted: :white_check_mark: %1, your reschedule for the match %2 has been accepted.
reschedule.refused: :x: %1, your reschedule for the match %2 has been refused.
reschedule.not_team_captain: You're not the team captain of your team, you can't use this command.
reschedule.staff_notification: Hi %1! The match %2 (%3 vs %4) has been rescheduled from %5 to %6. If you can't arbitrate/stream/commentate at this new time, please add a :x: reaction to this message.
reschedule.no_staff_notification: The match %1 (%2 vs %3) has been rescheduled from %4 to %5.
reschedule.removed_from_match: You have successfully been removed from the match %1.

name_change.help: Changes your nickname to your osu username
name_change.no_access: But your name couldn't be change in the spreadsheets and/or challonge. Please, contact an admin.

disable_name_change.help: Disables or enables the name_change command.

take_match.help: Gives the staff member the matches wanted.
take_match.no_schedules_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any schedules spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_schedules_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_schedules_spreadsheet/parameter`.
take_match.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
take_match.successfully_taken_matches_id: As a %1, you **succesfully** took the matches:
take_match.already_taken_matches_id: As a %1, those matches were **already taken**:

take_match_as_referee.help: Gives the referee the matches wanted.

take_match_as_streamer.help: Gives the streamer the matches wanted.

take_match_as_commentator.help: Gives the commentator the matches wanted.

drop_match.help: Drops the matches the staff member want to drop.
drop_match.no_schedules_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any schedules spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_schedules_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_schedules_spreadsheet/parameter`.
drop_match.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
drop_match.successfully_dropped_matches_id: As a %1, you **succesfully** dropped the matches:
drop_match.already_dropped_matches_id: As a %1, you **weren't on** the matches:

drop_match_as_referee.help: Drops the matches the referee want to drop.

drop_match_as_streamer.help: Drops the matches the streamer want to drop.

drop_match_as_commentator.help: Drops the matches the commentator want to drop.

get_matches.help: Gets a list of taken matches.
get_matches.no_schedules_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any schedules spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_schedules_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_schedules_spreadsheet/parameter`.
get_matches.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com

post_result.help: Post the result of a match
post_result.no_players_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any players spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_players_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_players_spreadsheet/parameter`.
post_result.no_schedules_spreadsheet: This tournament does not have any schedules spreadsheet registered. Consider using the `%1set_schedules_spreadsheet $tosurnament/set_schedules_spreadsheet/parameter`.
post_result.spreadsheet_error: Either the spreadsheet's id is incorrect, or the ranges are incorrect, or we couldn't connect to the spreadsheet. If you are sure that it is a connection problem and that the problem persists, contact me at spartan.plume@gmail.com
post_result.invalid_challonge: Either the challonge set is invalid, or you didn't give access to the challonge to `TosurnamentBot`.
post_result.match_not_found: Match not found, there seems to be an error on the challonge.
post_result.participant_not_found: The match %1 could not be updated in the challonge. Please, make sure that the participant names in the challonge are correct.

post_result_with_scores.help: Post the result of a match
